id.description: Unique identifier for this mod. Must be globally unique within all mods from all loaders.

deprecated.description: If true, users should be warned about it and invited to uninstall this mod, and directed to install the appropriate replacement.

redownloadId.description: Increment this number to force clients to redownload this mod. Useful when a mod needs to be redownloaded without a new version being released.

engine.description: Game engine that this mod supports.

unityBackend.description: Only relevant if engine=Unity. Scripting backend used by the game.

sourceCode.description: URL of a repository with the mod's source code.

description.description: Short description that explains what the mod does.

root.description: Optional, path of the root folder within the zip.
